articles.title: The New Apple Watches Are Here. You Should Probably Upgrade - WIRED
articles.description: Blood oxygen sensor controversies aside, improved battery life, new hypertension notifications, and the addition of satellite messaging are all good reasons to get a new Apple Watch this year.
